Another dismissal I get is "I'm not retarded enough to read the story of a porn". which doesn't work either because of the term "A Picture tells a thousand words". Even if you take the dialogue out of a NTR, the pics are designed to make it clear that you don't even need to hear them talking to guess what their saying and doing, I got alot of Pics from NTR's in my folders since the art was good and fapable, but the rule is, I have to know it's not a NTR, such as the guy getting "stolen" is even seen at all, especially the "fucking in front of him or seen by him scenes", it doesn't come from an existing work that I've seen already like Naruto or such, and basically I see it as just Corruption/Moral Degenaration and noting more. and no English, I trick my brain into seeing it as Non-NTR this way to enjoy. Otherwise if the illusion is broken, I delete it to forget it existed. just how it is.

Again, I forgot, but someone did collect all that Artists work into one book, so you should be able to find it (It was a year ago that I saw it, I remember the story, but I don't remember the name)

"Hentai Logic" has become the new "Turn your Brain off" that many anime reviewers on youtube especially DXFan have made clear they've started to despise. It seems like the intent was that term shielded "Silly Nonsense" in an anime like Mirai Nikki from being seriously critized because of a large amount of it's sillyness, but sadly for those. Good stuff like Konosuba and even before that GURREN 'FUCKING' LAGANN exist to prove that with your brain "on or off", they hold up especially if you remove the silliness. Without the silliness, something like Mirai Nikki cannot hold up and isn't worth your time if you have to turn your brain off to enjoy (Though I still love the "Yuno x Yukki" Yandere Hentai it spawned LOL, and those have a better story then the source it was taken from too).

And yes the BS excuse of "it's just hentai logic" doesn't make it better. I've red comments that said to just jerk off and not to pay attention, but if I wanted that I would just go watch a regular porn, or the worst excuse "Just put yourself in the shoes of the guy doing the fucking and not the cuck crying" and then you understand why I said the never had a girlfriend remark. So yes hentai logic doesn't give it an excuse to be so blatantly retarded or infuriating incoherent.

To be honest my problem with NTR is mostly the story structure that sometimes makes no sense and does not work. Cheating hentai have always been there and I don't have beef with them but NTR just takes that concept and kind off shits all over it. For instance Sanagi Torajirou (Takeda Hiromitsu dumber younger brother) have lots of stories like that one in particular that seems made to piss me off. A happy couple move in to a new apartment and the landlord of set building used to be bully by the wife in high school, (You know we're this is going by now) landlord uses that information to blackmail her into becoming his cumdump or he'll tell the husband about her. This artist is known to always do shit like this in all his stories and is actually quite sad and boring.

I learned to just make them say "Oh my car" like in the Street Fighter games. It makes it funnier (After seeing so many repeats of the same scene, I have nothing but apathy for NTR now. All I get mad at is the tag's not being properly applied because it's becoming noticeable. That and so many FUCKING re-uploads (Especially of NTR), truthfully if it's to remove the censors on that one, then I don't mind, but why the fuck did I see so many uploads of that recently new Takeda story. That was too much honestly. Doesn't matter the genre (Mostly pissed because I was expecting newer stories, not a re-upload of a story that WAS ALREADY UPLOADED). This also seems to collide with my problem with the tags as a I noticed the "Already Uploaded" tag on them.....which means if they did that shit to a NTR story the never put more then that tag on it, causing the blacklist not to work unless you blacklist the Artist/Group. I'd rather not do so on those who actually do more then NTR. but left no choice.
